name: PHProjectTypeDescriptionDataSource
desc: A protocol that you use to provide the project with type description data.

items.name: func subtypes(for: PHProjectType) -> [PHProjectTypeDescription]
items.desc: Provides the root-level project type descriptions and descriptions of any promised subtypes with canProvideSubtypes set to true.

items.name: func typeDescription(for: PHProjectType) -> PHProjectTypeDescription?
items.desc: Provides the updated project type description for previously invalidated project types.

items.name: func footerText(forSubtypesOf: PHProjectType) -> NSAttributedString?
items.desc: Provides the footer text for the subtypes of the given project type.

items.name: func extensionWillDiscardDataSource()
items.desc: Provides an opportunity to use the data source before it's released.
